posts.post_title: SOLD: SLer Tony Thebo, Waco, raw...
posts.post_content:
Nice Southern Leaguer, Tony Thebo, depicted with the Waco, Texas team.

The price is $SOLD.  I'd trade it for an Otey card in roughly equivalent condition.
